meanings.definition: A visible mark on a document indicating its authenticity or ownership.
meanings.sent1: The watermarking on the certificate proved its originality.
meanings.sent2: The watermarking on the painting showed it was a genuine piece.
meanings.sent3: The watermarking on the letter made it look official.
meanings.sent4: The watermarking on the ticket was like a seal of approval.
meanings.sent5: The watermarking on the contract was clear and unmistakable.

meanings.definition: The process of adding a visible mark to a document to prevent unauthorized copying or alteration.
meanings.sent1: The watermarking of the logo stopped counterfeiters.
meanings.sent2: The watermarking of the image protected it from being copied.
meanings.sent3: The watermarking of the photo was like a security measure.
meanings.sent4: The watermarking of the design acted as a safeguard.
meanings.sent5: The watermarking of the text was a security feature.
